name: PaddleFlap
description:
This is a prototype, but the gameplay loop is complete.

Slam the red balls to the left and the blue balls to the right.

Scoring points:

If you hit a moving target (the big balls) with a ball of that color you get 1 point.

Losing lives:

If the ball drops too low, you lose a life.

If the ball is slammed in the wrong direction (blue to left or red to right) you lose a life.

Keyboard controls:

A or LEFT: Flap the left paddle

D or RIGHT: Flap the right paddle

Touch screen:

Tap either side of the screen to Flap the paddle on that side.

The game has absolutely 0 polish, I know. If anyone is kind enough to drop a comment please do so about the core gameplay. The goal of this project was to make a quick playable prototype. Enjoy!
